description: ERECTION OF SINGLE STOREY SHOWROOM BUILDING TO BE USED IN CONNECTION WITH CAR SALES AREA AT 70 KINGSTON ROAD.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Before the building/extension hereby permitted is first occupied, the windows in the showr elevation of the shall be glazed with obscured glass and fixed shut and shall be maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 3 - Prior to use of the showroom hereby permitted the boundary wall to the forecourt area adjacent to No.1 Brisbane Avenue as indicated on drawing No.GH 89/1B (amended) shall be erected to the satisfaction of the Council and this wall shall be permanently retained thereafter. Reason for condition:To prevent overlooking and loss of privacy to the adjoining residential property.
